name: 量子力學（二）
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選 ◎課程不開放上修
description: 介紹量子力學的基本原理、觀念、計算方法和應用，以作為進一步從事物理研究的準備
goals: 瞭解量子力學的發展及理論
syllabus:
1. Symmetries

   A. Systems with N Degrees of Freedom

   B. Symmetries and Their Consequences

  

2. General Theory of Angular Momentum: 

    A. Rotational Invariance and Angular Momentum

    B. Addition of Angular Momentum 

    C. Spin

  

3\. The Hydrogen atom

  

4\. EPR Paradox and Quantum Entanglement

  

5\. Approximation Methods

    A. Variational and WKB Methods

    B. Time-Independent Perturbation Theory

    C. Time-Dependent Perturbation Theory and Adiabatic Approximation

  

6\. Relativistic Quantum Mechanics:

    A. The Klein-Gordan Equation

    B. The Dirac Equation
